item.description:
This meetup is about social networking so.............let's do it!

I will oversee the introductions, try to provide a few laughs and get the conversation flowing by offering topics for discussion. Want to suggest a topic or two?

There are over 375 members of this meetup group. Let's meet!

I will also have a deck of cards with me if anyone knows any card tricks or want to play gin, hearts, poker...etc.

$2 to cover the cost of website.
item.how_to_find_us: I will be in the lobby lounge

group.name: 40/50 Something Year Olds - Men & Women Social Networking

item.name: Social Netowking
